definitions.definition: used with the past simple to express that you feel sorry or sad about a state or situation that exists at the moment:
examples: I wish (that) I was/were a bit taller.

definitions.definition: used with the past perfect to express that you feel sorry or sad about a particular action in the past:
examples: I wish (that) I hadn't eaten so much.
[ + to infinitive ] Did he express any wish to see me?
